trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Bushnell
There were no other sightings in Bushnell on or around December 12th 2000
Summary: White Glowing Saucer Following Old Path of Tornado
divs: Sighting DetailsI was stolling on the walkway in my front yard enjoying a cup of tea.I thought I saw what looked like a helocopter search light in the SE sky behindmy home. It proceded to follow the same path a tornado took one year previous.It came without sound but, the Palmeto bugs that were making their eveningsounds that were deafening, all stopped instantly.It was a warm evening withcool breezes, temp around 70 degres and a completely clear night sky, you couldsee every star. Our home sat in open fields so, I had a clear view ofeverything. The saucer stayed on path, traveling at about 5 mph. When it wasdirectly overhead I felf completely at peace and my heart felt up-lifted. Thesaucer glowed yet the only thing I noticed moving on it was a gold ball withtail circling ever so slowly around its perimeter. I loss sight of the objectwhen it went far enough west to be below the treeline.
